name: csc349-proof-help
description: Students share tips and resources for the CSC 349 proof assignment.

events.content: Stuck on the last induction proof for HW4. Any resources besides the textbook?
Check the Canvas "Proof Clinic" PDF from week 3—it walks through strong induction format.
Also rewatch the recorded lecture from 4/10. I annotate the base step and induction hypothesis the grader expects.
I keep a Google Doc with sample proofs (anonymized). DM me if you want it.
Thanks! I’ll rewatch that lecture tonight.
